mapper.update: update information set aae100='0' where IFT001 = #{ift001,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update information set AAB301 = #{aab301,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IFT003 = #{ift003,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFT004 = #{ift004,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFT005 = #{ift005,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFT006 = #{ift006,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFT007 = #{ift007,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IFT008 = #{ift008,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE036 = #{aae036,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AAE011 = #{aae011,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IFT009 = #{ift009,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATASOURCE = #{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE100 = #{aae100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEBY = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEBY = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AAE012 = #{aae012,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETEBY = #{deleteby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETEDATE = #{deletedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where IFT001 = #{ift001,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select IFT003, IFT004, IFT005, IFT006, IFT007, IFT008,rn from (select IFT003, IFT005, IFT006, IFT007, IFT008, IFT004,rownum rn from (select ift008, ift005, ift003, ift004, ift006, ift007 from( select c.name ift008, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '1') ift004, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '2') ift003, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '5') ift005, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '3') ift006, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '4') ift007 from recursion c where c.parentid=#{aab301}) where (ift005+ift003+ift006+ift007)>0 ) a1 where rownum <= #{pageSize}) where rn >= #{startRecord}

select count(1) from( select c.name ift008, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '1') ift005, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '2') ift003, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '5') ift004, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '3') ift006, F_COUNTALL(c.aab301, '4') ift007 from recursion c where c.parentid=#{aab301}) where (ift005+ift003+ift006+ift007)>0
